医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
简单的尿液检查可能会使肾癌患者免于侵入性扫描新的研究表明，简单的尿液检查可以准确地表明肾癌在早期的复发，有可能使患者侵入性扫描和更快地获得治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/simple-urine-test-may-spare-kidney-kidney-cancer-patients-from-invasive-scans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/simple-urine-test-may-spare-kidney-kidney-kidney-cancer-patients-from-invasive-scans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06D267B4-F13A-4E97-8852-67F051C5828E Mon, 24 Mar 2025 12:21:02 -0400 Simple urine test may spare kidney cancer patients from invasive scans
爱泼斯坦 - 巴尔病毒触发溃疡性结肠炎的炎症细胞死亡溃疡性结肠炎（UC）是一种慢性复发性疾病，会引起结肠疼痛的炎症和溃疡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/epstein-barr-virus-triggers-inflammatoration-cell-cell-death-in-rcerative-colitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/epstein-barr-virus-triggers-inflammatoration-cell-cell-death-in-rcerative-colitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f8d640d-478C-468E-8967-C8EB7D3D1F86 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 12:17:08 -0400 Epstein-Barr virus triggers inflammatory cell death in ulcerative colitis
研究人员开发了增强NK细胞针对癌症的工具医院Del Mar Research Institute，Barcelona UniversitationAutònomade Barcelona和Pompeu Fabra University的一组研究人员开发了一种新工具，允许修改这些NK细胞以使其不受肿瘤的防御机制的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/researchers-develop-tovelop-to-to-enhance-nk-cells-cells-against-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/researchers-develop-tovelop-to-to-enhance-nk-cells-cells-against-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=151A72DA-CC72-4A78-B88E-09E75C7302FE Mon, 24 Mar 2025 12:12:45 -0400 Researchers develop tool to enhance NK cells against cancer
抑郁症预防计划显示青年的效力不平等根据美国心理学协会发表的新研究，一项帮助白人青年对黑人青年不有效的预防抑郁计划对黑人青少年不有效，这引起了人们对更多研究的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/depression-prevention-prevention-program-shows-unequal-effectives-effectives-mong-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/depression-prevention-prevention-program-shows-unequal-effectives-effectives-mong-among-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0d79c82-f840-48ae-aad4-08d3b6010110b4c Mon, 24 Mar 2025 12:06:16 -0400 Depression prevention program shows unequal effectiveness among youth
终身体重模式与肾癌风险有关中年的体重过多是肾癌的已知危险因素，但是新的研究表明，整个生命的体重模式也可能影响个人发展这种恶性肿瘤的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/lifelong-weight-patterns-linked-to-kidney-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/lifelong-weight-patterns-linked-to-kidney-cancer-risk-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be1da75e-0beb-4fc2-9d9a-c7eedb94b94b366 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 10:32:15 -0400 Lifelong weight patterns linked to kidney cancer risk
新技术在前列腺手术中加倍勃起功能保存根据UCL和UCLH的研究人员的一项临床试验的结果，一种提高前列腺癌手术精度的技术意味着，与接受标准手术的人相比，几乎是维护勃起功能的两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/new-technique-doubles-erectile-functile-function-prestracter-restate-instate-surery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/new-technique-doubleres-erectile-functile-function-prestract-restration-instate-surery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ca82bb0-8c69-4fcd-a4df-ffa2c9daa4af Mon, 24 Mar 2025 10:28:00 -0400 New technique doubles erectile function preservation in prostate surgery
结核病病例在欧洲继续增加ECDC和世界卫生组织（WHO）欧洲区域办公室发布的新数据显示，近39,000个报告了2023年的结核病病例，欧盟和欧洲经济区（EU/ EEA）国家（EU/ EEA）国家继续看到TB通知的增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/tuberculosis-cases-cases-cases-castinue-to-rise-in-in-europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/tuberculisosis-cases-cases-cases-castinue-to-continue-to-rise-in-europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb95e889-a5f7-45b3-8810-c95eab670 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 10:24:17 -0400 Tuberculosis cases continue to rise in Europe
脂肪肝病与许多常见疾病的死亡风险有关Karolinska Institutet的一项全面研究表明，患有脂肪肝病的人的死亡率几乎是普通人群的两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/fatty-liver-disease-link-to-mortality-mortality-mortality-comp-from-many-common-common-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/fatty-liver-disease-link-to-higher-mortality-mortality-mortality-comp-from-many-common-common-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5392f91e-ef0f-4d35-943d-6cacf2add8a6 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 09:25:00 -0400 Fatty liver disease linked to higher mortality risk from many common diseases
机器学习有助于预测IBD患者的早期死亡率根据在CMAJ（加拿大医学协会期刊）发表的一项研究中，几乎一半死于炎症性肠病（IBD）过早死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/machine-learning-helps-predict-early-mortality-mortality-in-ibd-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/machine-learning-helps-predict-predict-early-mortality-in-ibd-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f98c2441-fb1e-430f-94f-94f-94fa-2d1c5a4fffe7 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 08:34:00 -0400 Machine learning helps predict early mortality in IBD patients
联合疗法可以预防数千例心血管死亡最大的分析是检查降低动脉阻塞的患者“不良”胆固醇水平的最佳方法表明，应立即将他们汀类药物和另一种称为Ezetimibe的药物组合，而不是单独给他汀类药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/Combination-therapy-could-prevent-thousands-of-cardiovascular-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/combination-combination-therapy-could-prevent-prevent-th-cardiascular deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5E0A207D-0940-4AE2-A181-A181-A49A9CDC3C9E Mon, 24 Mar 2025 07:18:36 -0400 Combination therapy could prevent thousands of cardiovascular deaths
